name: Black Stars Matter
description:
The modifications I created:

1. Completely redrawn all elements
2. Created two unique enemies (a ship with two cannons and a circular ship with eight cannons)

3. Changed the configuration of the player's guns

4. Added UI life indicator in the form of spacesuits and wrote the code for its behavior
5. Changed the characteristics of the player and enemies to balance
6. Added end credits after passing the game and wrote the code to exit the game through the key

Made by Malik Valli
